record.title: RENEWABLE ENERGY AND JOB CREATION ACT OF 2008--MOTION TO PROCEED
record.narrative:
RENEWABLE ENERGY AND JOB CREATION ACT OF 2008--MOTION TO PROCEED -- (Senate - June 06, 2008)

[Page: S5376]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now move to proceed to Calendar No. 767, H.R. 6049, energy production and conservation, and I send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

We, the undersigned Senators, in accordance with the provisions of rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate, hereby move to bring to a close debate on the motion to proceed to Calendar No. 767, H.R. 6049, the Renewable Energy and Job Creation Act of 2008.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the mandatory quorum required under rule XXII be waived.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
